mapper.update: UPDATE ${com}.D_T2_BRANCH SET BRANCH_ID = #{branchId}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, QUERY_CODE = #{queryCode}, PRICE_TYPE = #{priceType}, BRANCH_ADDRESS = #{branchAddress}, CONTACT_MAN = #{contactMan}, EMAIL = #{email}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, FAX = #{fax}, REMARK = #{remark}, PARK = #{park}, TAG = #{tag}, LON = #{lon}, LAT = #{lat} WHERE BRANCH_ID = #{oldBranchId}
